# Origraph

## UX Innovations for NoSQL Thinking

"Data scientist" is an incredibly broad term.

At Origraph, we believe that data literacy is a universal skill, and that **everyone is already qualified** to explore the space of possible ways to organize informationâ€”whether or not language or software are expressive or usable enough to keep up with human superpowers for reasoning about information.

Origraph is a work-in-progress data editor, that we hope to release under an open source license in the coming months. [More info](about.qmd)
